title: LEVX Distribution (Final)
body:
## Overview
Total supply of LEVX is 33,333 and it'll not change unless there's a further proposal and consensus. 30k will be airdropped to twitter 1k followers, 3k to discord 10k members and the rest for OH-GEEZ holders and to the treasury, etc.

### Twitter 1k Followers
* Class 1: 3k
* Class 2: 6k
* Class 3: 6k
* Class 4: 6k
* Class 5: 3k

### Discord
* 10k Members: 3k

### The rest
* Treasury: 3k
* OH-GEEZ to LEVX swap: 2,760
* Auction in LevX Pad: 573

## History
We had two proposals passed for LEVX distribution.
* [LEVX Allocation](https://dictatorship.levxdao.org/#/proposal/QmX4zuW5ETRHH9SGwTeKvwDczFBdkmABtu9mxq45QfDTud)
* [LEVX Twitter Distribution Plan](https://dictatorship.levxdao.org/#/proposal/QmXDHXZPDdXPoUznBhMhwnf2E1Gqnejru7FtB6EGJnUbiL)

After hearing feedbacks from the community, I'm proposing the final plan for distributing LEVX to align the incentives of holders and a sustainable & competitive tokenomics.

## Updates
We have 3 updates and two of them were already announced in the discord, another one proposed in https://levx-dao.canny.io/damn-requests/

### Treasury
![screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/5hLeCTC.png)

[_check the proposal_](https://levx-dao.canny.io/damn-requests/p/levx-token-distribution)
We'll create a treasury(0x0903f8892c06A99bf1D68088fAB597a0762e0BC8) and the fund will be used for growing & empowering all the projects under the dao.

Rough idea of how to use the treasury is:

* Twitter/Discord campaign for bringing new users: the more users we have, the higher the value of LEVX will be.
* For recruiting more talents as Summers: we need best devs/designers/marketers/cms who'll work full time for the dao.
* Partnership/Marketing: we'll contact influencers to promote projects under the dao and quality projects to create partnerships that'll help us.

Other usages of this fund can be proposed by community as long as it's for increasing the value of the dao.

### 3k LEVX for 10k Discord Members
![screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/FfzrWPz.png)

[_check the announcement_](https://discord.com/channels/740031904757317742/896610753212219432/902423266470293526)

3k LEVX will be airdropped for 10k discord members. The distribution will follow y=1/(x^2) graph so early members will get significantly more amount than late comers.

### UNCLAIMED LEVX
![screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/WeBXIzP.png)

[_check the announcement_](https://discord.com/channels/740031904757317742/896610753212219432/912622234324070412)

After 4 weeks of claim period,  unclaimed LEVX will be used for rewarding OH-GEEZ LP, LEVX LP holders and the rest will go to the treasury.

The ratio between three will be decided by further proposals and votes. You can propose your ideas in https://levx-dao.canny.io/damn-requests/
choices: I can't support any of these
author: 0x5b8C253517b6Bd003369173109693B01cb6841B5
